channel.title: Posts on Kevin Dienst's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kevin Dienst's Blog

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo This site was created using Hugo as my static site generator! In addition the site runs on a VPS by Digital Ocean and the web server is Caddy Server. Please take a look, they’re all awesome projects and if you want to support them, use DO for your server hosting needs and look at sponsoring Caddy Server on GitHub.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hello! üëã For my day job I work at a Fortune 500 company helping with offensive security and network security monitoring. I am a consummate student of Information Security/Cybersecurity. My current focus areas include Red Team Ops, Infrastructure, and Python. Historically I’ve worked on large scale enterprise SIEM deployments, full-packet capture systems, forward and reverse proxies, etc. When I’m not working I spend my time playing RPG games üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, board games üé≤, and watching Sci-Fi films üëæ.
